Specimen Type(s): Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded normal and neoplastic tissue
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Virtuoso System for IHC Ki-67 (30-9), a digital pathology image analysis system assisting pathologists in semi-quantitative measurement of Ki-67 in breast tissue
Indications for Use Summary: Aid to pathologists for display, detection, counting, review, and classification of tissues and cells of clinical interest and for semi-quantitative measurement of Ki-67 protein in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded breast tissue, adjunct to the CONFIRMTM anti-Ki67 (30-9) assay and not sole basis for treatment decisions
